name: BloodTower
description:
You were imprisoned in the Blood Tower and you have to get out of there as fast as you can because "something" is feeding on Blood...

Get the tools you need to find the exit and to slay the "thing".

[A] [D] = Move Left/Right

[W] or [SPACEBAR] = Jump

[LMB] or [J] = Attack

// This is my overall first game ever. As I am still learning UE4, bugs may occur (and it may not run smoothly). I made everything by myself except the Character Sprite, also there is no Music.

I hope you enjoy :)

Is anyone even reading these lol?
